thread.title: Cascade's Kaiden Ford wins Maps Credit Union Athlete of the Week
thread.title_full: Cascade's Kaiden Ford wins Maps Credit Union Athlete of the Week

author: Statesman Journal staff - Unlimited Digital Access
title: Cascade's Kaiden Ford wins Maps Credit Union Athlete of the Week
text: Cascade boys basketball player wins Maps Credit Union High School Athlete of the Week Cascade boys basketball player Kaiden Ford is the Maps Credit Union High School Athlete of the Week, [winning a poll voted on by readers](https://www.statesmanjournal.com/story/sports/2024/03/10/vote-for-the-maps-credit-union-high-school-athlete-of-the-week/72925588007/). The junior scored 21 points in Cascade’s 63-53 third place victory over Marist Catholic in the 4A state tournament. Here is another look at the other nominees this week. Kyleigh Brown, Silverton girls basketball Senior Kyleigh Brown [scored a team-high 22 points and had a game-high 12 rebounds](https://www.statesmanjournal.com/story/sports/2024/03/10/silverton-girls-basketball-crater-comets-osaa-5a-state-championship/72919490007/) for Silverton in the Foxes 61-60 overtime win over Crater in the 5A state tournament. Cruz Veliz, Woodburn boys basketball Junior Cruz Veliz scored 17 points in Woodburn’s 67-37 third place victory over Putnam in the 5A state tournament. Maddie Dustin, Cascade girls basketball Senior Maddie Dustin scored 15 points in Cascade’s 35-33 third place victory over Philomath in the 4A state tournament.
